channel.title: I just want help!
channel.description:
Hey I'm actually working on a project ( 2006 remake with some guys ) well i was wondering if anybody knows how to make a handler to be specific a dialoguehandler
like public class dialogue handler {
Repping++ Thanks, i want that to make the client.java lite and to make easier the dialogues
NOTE [size=14pt] IF you dont have nothing to good to say dont comment, thanks[/size]

item.title: I just want help!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

http://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317_Protocol#Client_-.3E_Server_Packets

Looks like the documentation isn’t written. Just look in the client for packet 40. You should look into handling packets. Look at other packets and see how they handle packets according to the different variable types. Reading that documentation might help you also.

Read full topic
